comment: Her class is interesting, she cares about her students success and shes always available to help you outside of class. If you skip, you would not get an A. Show up, show you care, and try!

One of the best professors at ksu , always accessible outside of class. Extremely understanding and passionate about her work. I learned so much in her class, lectures are great and interesting. group projects/homework/tests and extra credit .
Easiest class I've taken in college. Just show up and do weekly assignments and you will pass with flying colors.

Professor Roman is super caring and understanding. There's no tests. Only two quizzes and a bunch of weekly assignments that aren't hard, just time-consuming if you're taking her hybrid. Not all of her instructions were all that clear, but if you have any questions, she's more than willing to help you. She made the class easy. Definitely take her
She is super sweet and you can tell she really cares about her students. The majority of your grade is just going to be simple 5-10 point assignments that are assigned weekly.
